meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Monk Tony Harkins Gary Frost Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2747.

td.p: Linda Monk, an author & columnist originally from Vicksburg, Mississippi
Tony Harkins, a Ph.D. candidate from Madison, Wisconsin
Gary Frost, a graduate student from Chapel Hill, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,200)

tr.td: AMPHIBIANS
FAMOUS NAMES
THE MOVIES
ORGANIZATIONS
AMERICAN HISTORY
RHYME TIME
